Html: This is my first time using Rawr and I have a question.  I am using the Healadin module and there is information on a Spell Rotation.  It tells me the times involved with each healing spell but i cannot find any information on an actual rotation.  Is there such info, or do I try and mathematically figure out a rotation from the times given.  any help you can give me is greatly appreciated.

It doesn't appear to give a specific rotation. It appears to just provide a quick listing of your heals and casting times for each.

I'm gonna suggest, based on other class specs, that there might not be a "standard" rotation. There might be a "priority" rotation (one spell having priority over another) or simply it varies too much from one fight to another.

Hopefully a paladin player can give more insight.
